stories.text: And for this reason, Russia would never use them to win the war with Ukraine?
stories.title: Ask HN: Wouldn't using nuclear weapons in Ukraine be a sign of weakness?
'Grave Concern' as Ukraine's Zaporizhzhia Nuclear Plant Under Russian Orders

stories.text:
Hi HN,

When searching for a job (in tech specifically) I notice many of the listings were either poorly written or didn't have enough information about the role. And even if some do have adequate information I can get a hunch if it's a bad working environment based on red flag phrases/indicators.

Anyone know a good website to post a review for a listing/sift through listings with some reviews on the listings content?
stories.title: Ask HN: Is there a site I can go to see job 'listing' reviews?
Russia began active preparations for disconnection from the global Internet
